name: Owlboy
summary:
Owlboy is a platform/action-adventure video game created by Norwegian developer D-Pad Studio.
Explore a vibrantly crafted pixel world in this flying adventure platformer.
Being a mute, Otus struggles living up to the expectations of owl-hood. Things spiral from bad to worse with the sudden appearance of sky pirates.
What follows is a journey through monster infested ruins, with unexpected encounters, and burdens no one should have to bear.

name: Owys
summary: Owys is designed as a game where you can demostrate your ability. Test yourself with different mechanics along the different worlds that compose it. You can play offline, online and use the real-time editor. Discover the community levels and create your own.

name: Owari
summary: Owari is a variant of Mancala where players strategically attempt to capture stones from their opponent's row.

name: Owlboy: Collector's Edition
summary: Owlboy Collector's Edition includes the base game and Owlboy soundtrack.

name: OWN: On the Way to Nemroth
summary:
OWN is a browser-based game in which players fight each other in 1v1, 2v2 and 3v3 death matches. The heroes have small skillsets, like in MOBAs, and fight agressively on small maps, like in Brawlers.

The game emphasizes the competitive aspect with leagues, high-depth heroes and no random mechanics, but you can play casually as well in normal or private games.

name: Owlboy: Limited Edition
summary:
Owlboy is a story-driven platform adventure game, where you can fly and explore a brand new world in the clouds! Pick up your friends and bring them with you as you explore the open skies. 
 
Overcome obstacles and greater enemies, in one of the most detailed adventures of this era. Being a mute, Otus struggles living up to the expectations of owl-hood. Things spiral from bad to worse with the sudden appearance of sky pirates. What follows is a journey through monster-infested ruins, with unexpected encounters, well-kept secrets, and burdens no one should have to bear. 
 
The limited edition of Owlboy includes the base game, along with a range of alluring collector's items, in an exclusive limited edition box. Each of these boxes will include the following items: Owlboy game, certificate of authenticity, original soundtrack, notebook, manual, Owlboy logo Pin, Otus pin, two metal buccanary coins, pin box, and sticker sheet.

name: Owl's Midnight Journey
summary: Magic journey through the night forest looking for adventure!

name: Owl and Pals Preschool Lessons
summary:
Fun and learning for preschoolers! Help the owl and her animal friends through 11 fun and exciting games while learning the basics of numbers, letters, colors, shapes, spatial reasoning, and more.

A variety of animal friends, funny sound effects, and helpful voice narration will keep your kids entertained and wanting to play more. And make sure your child fills up their sticker board as they play through the games!

Children ages 3-6 will love these lessons and games!

Games: 
- Alphabet Bubbles
- Counting Bubbles
- Letter Raindrops
- Number Raindrops
- Shape Sorting
- Shape Racing
- Color Sorting
- Color Toy Box
- Fruit Catch
- Shadow Matching
- Jigsaw Puzzles

name: Owl Simulator
summary: You are Russian anonymous from typical creppy Russian's building.

name: Owen to have fun!
summary: Owen to have fun! this is a challenging but fun game with lots of traps and puzzles. You will have to spend your time to go through this game. Owen loves challenges, help him accomplish all the achievements!

name: Owls - A matching game for kids.
Owl Watch
summary: OWL WATCH is a short atmospheric adventure game where you travel around in different biomes. Awaken from your slumber as you venture out to seek ancient technology to aid you in a time of darkness.

name: Owling. Crowling. Bowling!
summary: Take part in an incredible magic school bowling tournament! Immerse yourself in an amazing adventure, destroy the plans of the Crowly faculty with your loyal feathered defenders. Use your skills to beat your opponents and lead your faculty to victory!

name: Owyn's Adventure
summary:
Call Grandpops and tell him that dinner's ready? What sounds like a straightforward task from Mum becomes an adventure when Owyn leaves the safety of his house and enters a garden world where threats abound, and not even the slowest of creatures can be trusted... 
 
Play as Owyn as he puzzles his way through the many landscapes of his adventure.

name: Owaranai Yuugure ni Kieta Kimi
summary:
10 years ago, a group of friends played hide-and-seek during twilight on the day of the local festival. One of them went missing and was never seen again.

The day of the festival once again arrives, and this time, Shuuya is determined to figure out what happened to his missing friend, and finally put an end to their long game of hide-and-seek.

name: O-Well
summary: A difficult plat former about building up the skill to overcome an obstacle.

name: Own Worst Enemy
summary: Action Platformer - GMTK Jam 2020 Entry

name: Owlone in the Woods
summary: Help an owl find its chicks after losing them - and the ability to fly - in a thunderstorm. In this short 2D platformer you slowly recover your ability to navigate the dangers of the forest as you bring your chicks back to your hollow one by one.

name: Owata's Action Online
summary: 『OWATA'S ACTION ONLINE』 is an online multiplayer 2D action FPS with super difficult. With the help of other players, you may be able to clear the difficult stages that are too painful to clear by yourself.

name: Owls
summary:
In Owls, children match random pairs of owls to clear the screen. After successfully completing each level, they are rewarded with a little fact about owls.
The Parliament School for Owls is very serious about the Buddy System. Every Owl has a buddy, and is not allowed to come in from recess without them. Your job is to help the Owls find their buddy and get in for lunch! Learn about Owls, watch the seasons change and see how quickly you can send the Owls home. Can you earn 3 stars in every level? Every 25 levels the seasons change from Spring to Summer, Fall and Winter. They can earn up to 3 stars per level depending on how quickly they clear the screen, and go back as many times as they wish to retry.

name: Owarinaki Natsu, Towa Naru Shirabe
summary:
In Kyushu, there lies the small village of Sunomura. In that small village, four childhood friends, Touma Takumi, Ogami Ritsuko, Amamiya Kanon, and Takanashi Mio comprise a small music club at the village school. One day, Takumi happens to see and hear the violin performance of Orihara Ai, a girl who recently moved to the village and transferred into the school. This performance later eventually causes Ritsuko to resolve to recruit Ai into their music club no matter what.

However, one day, one of the childhood friends is separated from the other three, but before doing so passes on her role of "Supervisor" to Takumi. Later, they learn that the school they all attend is going to be closed down in one month due to a government-ordered evacuation of the village. Everyone resolves to make their last month together as memorable and enjoyable as possible before the school closes down...

name: Oware3D
summary: Oware3D is a Mancala style game featuring HD graphics and awesome game play.

name: Owinka Shooter
summary: Owinka Shooter throws you into an action packed mad-dash through an evil facility. Get ready to fight for your escape!

name: Owl Rescue
summary: Owl Rescue sounds the alarm! A class full of young post owls has been kidnapped! Help their teacher Keeper discover their whereabouts. Follow the trail of the kidnapper through a mix of Hidden Object and Match 3 gameplay. Discover the clues that will lead you to the thief with the help of companion Bella. Take flight with Owl Rescue today!

name: Owarai Yoiko no Game-dou: Oyaji Sagashite 3-choume
Owlman
summary: The following is a series of tapes recovered near the Overlook National Park where four people were recently reported missing- a family of three and one motorist.

name: Owinka Shooter 2
summary: Owinka Shooter 2 throws you right back into the story of Owinka 427. Prepare to escape the Institute once and for all!

name: Own the Throne
summary: Own the Throne is an open-world, action-adventure RPG that combines your Nightmares with your ordinary city life. The strong minded will gain special power nightmare use and succeed in the City. Get rich in the city and live with the curse of the Sword by Owning the throne in your Nightmares.

name: Owari no Kane ga Naru mae ni: Chapter 1 - Plus Edition
summary: This popular visual novel has returned with additional content.

name: OwnRulesRPG
summary:
"OwnRules RPG" is an immersive open-world role-playing game that allows you to slip into the role of a fictional character.
The game offers a variety of features that allow you to fully customize your character, from choosing their appearance to their clothing and vehicles.

name: Owari no Kane ga Naru mae ni: Chapter 2
Owlet's Embrace
summary:
An owlet afraid of flight sets off to explore a vibrant mysterious world and rediscover itself. On this heartwarming adventure, you'll confront the owlet's deepest fears as only the greatest challenges can lead to the most profound growth.

Owlet's Embrace is an action exploration platformer, blending fast paced grappling hook manouvers with combat and emotional discovery.

name: Owl Observatory
summary: Embark on a surreal, time-looping journey in this horror comedy point-and-click adventure with a delicious twist. Eternity begins now: At the Owl Observatory!

name: OwnTrio: Adventure
summary: A game in which the protagonist can multiply himself up to three times, and then reunite them.Self 1 and Self 2 move with the goal of meeting each other.And self 3 manipulates the map to help self 1 and 2 meet.And they manipulate these actions by themselves at the same time!

name: Owner
summary: A RPG adventure game where society, economy, philosophy and politics mix in a fun and ironic way, forcing the player to take tough decisions that challenge morality and affect the game ending.

name: Owe Money Pay Money
summary: Big Chief embarks on a quest for justice & cold hard cash in this retro brawler. Packed with eye-popping pixel art, 8-bit bangers, & a Singaporean twist, it’s as bizarre as beat ‘em ups get. Welcome to Owe Money Pay Money (O$P$)!

name: O.W.L Projekt
summary: O.W.L Projekt is a 3D isometric puzzle game that will test your mind and logic skills. Controlling Elysion, a young being created in a mysterious experiment, you will face the enigmatic Watchers in a journey to escape and uncover secrets.

name: Owl Force
summary: Lead the legendary Owl Force and your wingmates on an epic journey defending the galaxy against the nefarious Darktail Order. Take on missions, upgrade your ship, and engage in heart-pounding battles to uncover the hidden secrets of the universe.

name: Owold
summary: Owold is a type of Psychological Horror game. A story that emerged after an event that took place years later when humanity completely placed itself in the multiverse.

name: O.W.L Projekt 2
summary: Guide a young being’s daring adventure as you puzzle your way through diorama-style landscapes!

name: O.W.L.: One Wave Length
summary: OWL is top down, rogue like bullet-hell that you can play with up to 1 friend. Everything is in beat, including your and the enemies attacks. With each new Instrument, new attack patterns unfold for you which will take you to your final obstacle; The Meowestro, the source of dissonance.

name: Owl Lights
summary: Owl Lights is a first-person psychological horror game. You play as 16-year-old Paul, who lives in a small town. Your parents are away, leaving you to spend the night alone—or so you think. There is something in the wind that night, something unpleasantly quiet.

name: Owari no Kane ga Naru mae ni Chapter3
summary: Owari no Kane ga Naru mae ni Chapter 3 is the final installment of a visual novel trilogy focusing on protagonist Ryohei Hasebe's winter romance. As he realizes his feelings for Yukino Sugano, a love triangle develops when her best friend also shows interest in him. The story explores themes of choice, loss, and the pursuit of one's future while navigating complicated relationships.

name: Owlette's Playground Cleanup
summary: Variant of Fancy Match included in Lexibook's Disney PJ Masks Portable Game Console.

name: OwlBox: Fantasy Gaming System
summary:
OwlBox: Fantasy Gaming System is a compilation of games (described as a "gaming system" in marketing) where a common theme are pixelated graphics, simple gameplay and all characters/units being owls, with major updates including new titles. Games included are:

-Owl Bottlecap Mania (since 1.0) - a game in which the player moves bottlecaps with different abilities on a grid
-Owlboxer (since 1.1) - a first-person boxing game
-Legends of Owltopia (since 1.2) - a fantasy first-person role-playing game with top-down turn-based combat

name: Owl Bounce
summary: Owl Bounce is an exciting 2D platformer arcade game where you control an amazing owl-shaped ball capable of incredible jumps! Immerse yourself in a world of colorful levels, where your goal is to collect juicy apples and avoid obstacles on your path to victory.

name: Owlen and the Spirits of the Past
summary: Help Owlen to restore the past, and uncover lost memories.
